query: query AllArticles($lemma: String!, $wantedLangs: [String]!, $wantedDicts: [String]!) { dictEntryList(exact: $lemma, wanted: $wantedLangs, wantedDicts: $wantedDicts) { dictName srcLang targetLang lookupLemmas { edges { node { lemma language pos __typename } __typename } __typename } translationGroups { translationLemmas { edges { node { lemma language pos __typename } __typename } __typename } restriction { restriction attributes __typename } exampleGroups { example translation __typename } __typename } __typename } conceptList(exact: $lemma, wanted: $wantedLangs) { name collections definition explanation terms { note source status expression { lemma language pos __typename } __typename } __typename } }
